message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.DM, cs.CC, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with a problem of searching a polygonal region using stationary guards, which is a classic problem in computational geometry (cs.CG). The problem is also related to scheduling and optimization (cs.DS), as well as decision-making and complexity theory (cs.DM, cs.CC). The use of lasers and the unpredictability of the intruder suggest a potential application of artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
